markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crunch](/Feats.aspx?ID=2790) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor. Your jaws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack deals 1d8 piercing damage instead of 1d6 and gains the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) trait.
name: Crunch
